MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="StorageConnectionString" value="DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=[account-name];AccountKey=[account-key]"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
CreateStorage();

LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to use Blob storage from .NET
How to use Blob storage from .NET

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: using Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob;
CreateFiles();
BatchSharedKeyCredentials cred = new BatchSharedKeyCredentials("https://[account-name].[region].batch.azure.com", "[account-name]", "[account-key]"); BatchClient client = BatchClient.Open(cred);
CreatePool(client);
ListPools(client);
CreateJob(client);
ListJobs(client);
AddTasks(client);
ListTasks(client);
DeleteTasks(client);
DeleteJob(client);
DeletePool(client);
Created the container. Press Enter to continue.
Uploaded the files. Press Enter to continue.
Created the pool. Press Enter to continue.
Pool name: testpool1 Pool status: Active Press Enter to continue.
Created the job. Press Enter to continue.
Job id: testjob1 Job status: Active Press Enter to continue.
